name: A-Forest
body:
# Home for A Forest, a MythTV theme.

![Media Library](screenshots/0.25/thumbs/menu-media.jpeg)

You can find more screenshots for mythtv here.

***

## Installation

* Theme Chooser is not up to date, until it will be you can get it with git:

> cd ~/.mythtv/themes/  
> git clone -b mythtv-master git://github.com/MythTV-Themes/A-Forest.git

* If you want to get the latest developing version, you can get it with subversion:

> cd ~/.mythtv/themes/  
> git clone git://github.com/MythTV-Themes/A-Forest.git

For get the update

> cd ~/.mythtv/themes/A-Forest  
> git pull

***
## Plugins development status for 0.25

Complete:

* MythTV
* MythVideo 

Todo:

* MythNetvision
* MythBrowser
* MythGallery
* MythMusic (wait for MythUI porting) 

Undeveloped:

* MythWeather
* MythNews
* MythZoneminder
* MythGame
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
